Method Detail

GetPointer

public BoundingBox GetPointer();
Gets the BoundingBox for the mouse pointer.
Returns:
The BoundingBox for the mouse pointer.

LeftClick

public bool LeftClick( BoundingBox& box );
Checks to see if the specified BoundingBox has been clicked by the left mouse button.
Returns:
true if a the left button is clicked on the BoundingBox, false otherwise.

LeftRelease

public bool LeftRelease( BoundingBox& box );
Checks to see if the specified BoundingBox has been released over by the left mouse button.
Returns:
true if a the left button is released on the BoundingBox, false otherwise.

RightClick

public bool RightClick( BoundingBox& box );
Checks to see if the specified BoundingBox has been clicked by the right mouse button.
Returns:
true if a the right button is clicked on the BoundingBox, false otherwise.

RightRelease

public bool RightRelease( BoundingBox& box );
Checks to see if the specified BoundingBox has been released over by the right mouse button.
Returns:
true if a the right button is released on the BoundingBox, false otherwise.

StateChange

public bool StateChange( int& button, int& state, int& x_, int& y_ );
Controls the passing of state changes for the mouse buttons.
Parameters:
button - The button the state change is being reported for.
state - The new state of the button. 1 for clicked, 0 for not clicked.
x_ - The x coordinate of the mouse pointer.
y_ - The y coordinate of the mouse pointer.
Returns:
true if a state has changed, false otherwise.

Update

public void Update( int& x_, int& y_ );
Updates the x,y position of the mouse pointer from Allegro.
Parameters:
x_ - Pass-by-reference value in which to return the new x coordinate.
y_ - Pass-by-reference value in which to return the new y coordinate.
